title: Spectroscopic characterization of europium binding to a calmodulin-EF4 hand peptide–polymer conjugate
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,14091-14099
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01505C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Dini Marlina, Yannic Müllers, Ulrich Glebe, Michael U. Kumke
A fundamental step in the development of peptide–polymer composites for novel lanthanide isolation modules using calmodulin-EF4 peptide as a binding motif for biological-motivated materials is presented.
